author: Gilli (Rebecca Gilliland)
text:
Me at 7am: 
Starts a new book thinking I’ll just read a few chapters
…
Me at 12:20pm: 
It’s been 5 hours and I’m two chapters away from the end

Today has been a freakin’ RIDE so far 📚 
#murder #revenge #romance #crime #littlebitspicy🌶 👀 https://t.co/Gx1wxM9B6s

author: Gilli (Rebecca Gilliland)
text:

If you need me today. Please do not.

author: Gilli (Rebecca Gilliland)
text:
As someone who did this and then had to have my voice, sanity and career saved by this man,

LISTEN TO HIM

No show is worth your health. 
And if people are petty, precious twats about you going off, send them to me and I’ll happily smack ‘em for you 🙃 https://t.co/L6hZUwYF8y
